name: Nothing On Frontlines
description:
NOTICE: The game is available to play in the browser, however, I strongly recommend downloading for the best gaming experience!

The game was made in 48 hours as a entry into Ladum Dare 45! (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/nothing-on-frontlines)

**Controls**

 - WASD/Arrow keys to move
 - LMB to shoot
 - Q to go onto builder mode
 - RMB to switch buildings
 - LMB in Build mode to place buildings

**Objective**
Protect the crystal in the middle of the map by shooting the enemies and building out a defensive strategy!

**Theme**
The game starts with an empty field and you have NOTHING to help you defend the base. As you progress, the map will start to evolve and you can build out a defense!
